content.detailedDescription: In the house watching tv.  looked out the window and saw and unusual glowing orange object in the sky. first thought it wa an airplane.   ran outside and noticed the object was totally silent. it was gracefully moving across th sky from northwest to southeast and glowing and flickering bright orangish red color. i felt elated and in awe. it simply disappeared.
content.summary: Glowing orangish red object sighted

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at approx 10:30, while driving home, my wife first noticed a very bright light in the sky.  it un-nerved her to the point she wanted to pull over on the highway.  we both got out of the car and watched two extremely bright orange lights at an altitude of approx 1000'.  they were moving fairly rapidly towards us from the west...Then slowed down...Appeared to hover for a minute, and then begin moving south.  

the lights were extremely bright, in fact, they were so bright it was impossible to discern any shape to the objects.  there were no navigation lights, and no blinking...Just constant light.  there was no sound at all.  it was a clear night with virtually no wind.  

we were not the only witnesses. several other cars had also pulled over to observe, including one police unit.

with the exception of the hovering mid-way, the flight speed was that typical of a small prop plane at that altitude, but again, there was no sound
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objects following same course

content.detailedDescription: Tuftonboro nh, i saw it first through the trees and i thought "that's gotta be darn bright to be shining through like that", we were sitting around a campfire.  the light eventually went into a clearing. the orb was bright orange fireball so bright that it gave a star pattern, the first appeared at10:12 and disappeared in the southeast horizon over the lake, total flight across sky about 1.5 minutes, it appeared to be moving quite fast. my father came and claimed that we (my daughter and mother) were seeing things as it had faded out by that time. about 2 minutes later a second appeared in the same, if not slightly more west, location approximately 10:17 pm. this time my father came out and he immediately asked for binoculars, this was no joke he's ex-navy. looking through them it was a circular orb for sure. there was a plane coming from the south and my father said "look it's going for the plane" then it stopped went north, then north west and finally disappeared in the southwest horizon leaving the small plane alone. my daughter wants to add that to her it was half orange and half yellow. i want to stress that the entire time there was absolutely no sound at all....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange orb cross night sky followed by a second with path change tuftonboro nh

content.detailedDescription: At 9:40 i was outside using sky safari, then suddenly noticed a moving object coming from the north heading south.  then a second object, exactly the same and on the same path.  they both seem to disappear in the same location as if they had gone higher.   definitely not a plane or firework.  both objects were probably visible for a minute at most.
content.summary: Two objects following same path and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were celebrating with fireworks when aaron (10yrs old) said look what's that.  his mother exclaimed ufo and i saw what i now have to say was a ufo very explainable,  here is the reply to case # that i gave:

we saw two of the exact same objects flying in a type of formation, same height as you described and flying at a steady speed.  by the time i got my video camera and ran to the front of our house to avoid trees it was traveling away from us.  i got some pretty good video of them but i couldn't hold the video cam still and with nothing for reference it appears as if they were darting back and forth and actually it was me zooming in and out and trying to keep them both in picture.  they stayed in the same formation and speed as they traveled east out of sight.  i live on r.D. mize about a mile from the old airport.  strangest unexplainable thing we have ever seen.
content.summary: Red objects in sky over indep mo

content.detailedDescription: While loading up my family into the car i noticed a  two star like objects in the middle of the day they were about a mile apart from each other just above the cloud line i grabbed my wife to confirm or deny what we were seeing, she confirmed and so they  hovered for about 20 minutes one of seemed to have dissappeared then the one that remained traveled north with a faster then a jet airliner speed that i've ever seen all the while i saw numerous private planes who all seemed to be travelling from an east to west path who could've seen the same thing but changed when going over the pacific ocean....If anyone saw something similiar plz post!!!
content.summary: 2 golf ball like object hovers then takes northern path

content.detailedDescription: Noticed strange cloud directly in front of me as i traveled west towards fresno on hwy 180. the cloud was essentially by itself and appeared to have a vapor like trail extending from below it up to its base. the promonent or larger cloud and the lower smaller cloud both had a ufoish shape as well. my friend jenna was with me and i asked her to take some photos. she took a couple through the windshield and a couple out the window as we continued towards it. i have reported this before and have had some strange things happen to my computer and picture files, though i do not know for sure that these issues were related , it seems like i was being disabled to locate my pictures and /or pursue sharing the pictures and info . i had visited a ufo site and shared the pictures there with folks who downplayed thier unusual nature and claimed not to see the craft i described. i am hoping you will take a better look and at least acknoweledge the possibility i am seeing something that looks like a craft emerging from atop and possibly through a cloud . please notice that the vapor like trail begins to dissipate shortly after first picture taken and the odd circular shape at the bottom of both the large and small clouds. in one of the photos i noticed upon zooming in what to me looks like the edges of a metallic yet translucent object on an angle with other details outlining a domed disc shaped craft exiting the cloud from the upper right in the photo.I have zoomed in and edited the contrast to best show the reflection of the edges and other details ...But i have in no way altered the photos besides.
content.summary: Witnessed this unusual cloud formation appearing to have an upwards spiral trail into it and later while observing pictures taken of the cloud noticed what appears to be a translucent craft exiting the clouds upper right side at an angle

content.detailedDescription: Noticed strange cloud directly in front of me as i traveled west towards fresno on hwy 180. the cloud was essentially by itself and appeared to have a vapor like trail extending from below it up to its base. the promonent or larger cloud and the lower smaller cloud both had a ufoish shape as well. my friend jenna was with me and i asked her to take some photos. she took a couple through the windshield and a couple out the window as we continued towards it. i have reported this before and have had some strange things happen to my computer and picture files, though i do not know for sure that these issues were related , it seems like i was being disabled to locate my pictures and /or pursue sharing the pictures and info . i had visited a ufo site and shared the pictures there with folks who downplayed thier unusual nature and claimed not to see the craft i described. i am hoping you will take a better look and at least acknoweledge the possibility i am seeing something that looks like a craft emerging from atop and possibly through a cloud . please notice that the vapor like trail begins to dissipate shortly after first picture taken and the odd circular shape at the bottom of both the large and small clouds. in one of the photos i noticed upon zooming in what to me looks like the edges of a metallic yet translucent object on an angle with other details outlining a domed disc shaped craft exiting the cloud from the upper right in the photo.I have zoomed in and edited the contrast to best show the reflection of the edges and other details ...But i have in no way altered the photos besides.
content.summary: Witnessed this unusual cloud formation appearing to have an upwards spiral trail into it and later while observing pictures taken of the cloud noticed what appears to be a translucent craft exiting the clouds upper right side at an angle

content.detailedDescription:
I live in denver colorado, i saw something on the 4 th of july i can't explain. we were watching fireworks in the night sky i think it was 9:15 or 9:30 i  stopped to notice a orange bright ball in the night sky. i looked towards my wife and said hey you see that thing. it didn't change position. it was a bright reddish gold ball.  i then walked from the front door to the back door to the deck. that's when it got really interesting. the light began moving and then another ball would pop in out of nowhere .���they began moving rapidly more came into phase then there were five balls in the sky making what appeared to be circular trajectory with comet tails then fading in and out then they took off straight down in unison out of sight over the tree line. 
this was not fireworks, this was not a plane or helicopter. it happened and i can't explain it. the worst part about it i can't find any information online or anywhere else who also witnessed it.���
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: This was not fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 10:15 pm i saw a yellowish /orange glowing light in the southwest sky above emmett idaho about 5-10 minutes before the fire works show started at first i thought it was a plane but the light was too large and did not appear to move whatsover after observing the light for 10 minutes i looked away for a about a minute and when i looked back up the light was gone! i searched the entire sky and saw no trace of it.
content.summary: Orange hovering light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette.When i finished smoking i put it out and started to go inside when i saw the ground flash from pink to blue,then it stopped.I thought it was weird but i assumed it was lightning.So after a minute or so i turn around to go back inside.And it happens again.This time i realized that i didnt not hear any thunder whatsoever.So now i'm beginning to wonder what the hell is going on.So i walk over to my car and lay my back on the hood.I wanted to see where this light was coming from.After a couple minutes i'm convinced it isn't going to happen again and just as i'm about to get up,i see this cloud above me,something above this cloud just lit up.But not only that,it flickered from pink to blue.When this happened i noticed the surrounding area of the ground light up.So now i knew that something up there was causing this phenomena.So i continue to lay there on the hood of my car and watched as it flickered a fourth time.After the fourth time,i see this long,dark shape come from out of the cloud on the left side.It was extremely long and on its side i could see a string of yellow and white lights that barely gave it a silhouette.But i could tell the bottom was not flat,it was slightly curvy,but not rounded.Almost wavy you could say.But it's size was what was most astounding.This was not a small bright light in the sky.It was nearly the size of the cloud that was covering it and i'm very certain i saw the rear-end of it because as it became visible,it was already turning its position towards north.It didn't speed off as i expected either.It just slowly drifted away and eventually disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: Extremely long craft emitting lights and heading north towards appalachian mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I know it has been several years now since an unexplainable incident occurred that my husband and myself witnessed, but i have decided it's time to finally share what happened with people who will hopefully believe me.  one night, in july of 2009 (i'm not sure of the exact date), my husband and i were outside in the front yard of our home.  at the time we lived in a home on my husband's employer's ranch.  the home we lived in was situated with dense woods in the front and left side of the house, with a horse pasture in our backyard, and a rural street on the right side of the house.  the view to the street was obscured with a few trees as we were set a little ways away from the road and the only way to access our home was down a short dirt road.  we lived in a very rural town and as you can tell we were isolated from any neighbors.  this night in july was hot and still. there was no wind and the sky was completely clear of clouds or rain. i was pregnant at the time and despite the fact the night was very hot, i followed my husband outside to help him place a call on my cell phone to his father who lives in another country.  it was about 10 o'clock at night and very dark.  i don't recall seeing the moon out that night, so either it was hidden by the trees or its was a moonless night.  the only lights that were visible were my porch light and one security light outside right by my house. my husband and i got in touch with his father and as he was talking to his dad, i decided to star gaze and listen to their conversation at the same time.  i have always enjoyed star gazing and have never even thought of spotting ufo's until this night.  anyways, i was standing in the middle of our front yard looking up at the sky in the direction on the rural street, and listening very intently to my husband's conversation at the same time. (i was listening intently because the conversation was in spanish and since my native language is english, i really needed to concentrate in order to understand what was being said.)i was so concentrated on the conversation it took me about 30 seconds to realize that where i had been looking at the night sky was no longer pure blackness marked by little white stars.  i blinked several times and upon opening my eyes i realized that there was a huge reddish-orange globe of light hovering in place in the sky, where before there had only been tiny stars.  before i could even process what i was seeing, 10 more lights of the same color and size blinked into existence from pure blackness all around the first light.  the lights were about a football field's distance away from us, hovering over the woods on the other side of the rural street and each looked about three times bigger than an average star.  at first i had thought they were stars, humungous stars, but stars all the same (i now realize i was in denial and shock).  then i started realizing that stars are not that color and they don't appear all at the same time in a group, nor were they ever that large. the time it took me from realizing that the first light had appeared to understanding that all those lights couldn't be stars was about 20 seconds.  at this time i noticed that these 11 or 12 lights were grouped in a tight, uneven circle. the lights weren't just outlining a circle, they were outside the circle also. so there was an uneven circle made of these brilliant reddish-orange lights that were just hovering there in the sky.  then i noticed the lights move apart from each other, still in a circle, but expanding the distance between themselves.  i was in complete shock to see them move in this way, and in even more shock when i noticed about five more of these blink into existence in the circle from seemingly complete nothingness.  at this point the lights in the center of the circle began circling and twisting around each other.  it's hard for me to describe exactly what it looked like, but they were circling and twisting in ways that i realized no air craft could move in. they were moving incredibly fast, making absolutely no sound, despite their closeness to me, and making sharp turns and circles around each other.  at that point i was terrified and shouted my husband's name -, who hadn't noticed anything as of yet since he was deep in conversation.  i said, "-, look at those lights right there, oh my god, those are not normal, i'm scared!"  he looked at them while still talking to his dad and said to me that they were probably from some sort of government experiment and not to be afraid.  he is a skeptic, just like i use to be, and since he grew up in a very poor, third world country with little technology, doesn't fully understand that the u.S. doesn't have technology that can move like that.  he and i both looked back up at the lights and by now every single light was moving in circles and wiggling around each other, while picking up speed and going faster and faster.  at this time i felt an all consuming fear that i can't put into words.  i don't consider myself special in any way psychically or spiritually, but i've always trusted my instincts.  at that point my intuition was telling me to run as far away as i could get.  i felt as though those lights were intelligent and knew i was down there looking up at them. i strongly felt like they were putting on a show for me and that whatever those lights were, were not of this world. i felt pure negative energy, every hair on my body stood up and i had goosebumps all over.  i remember sobbing and crying out god's name and begging him in prayer in my head to not let these lights take me.  i felt positive that these lights were either alien craft or the aliens themselves and that they were showing themselves to me for a reason.  within that short space of time i went from skeptic to a complete, terrified believer.  i ran towards my porch and stood on the steps screaming for my husband to get in the house.  he stood there looking at the lights and laughed a little and told me there was nothing to be afraid of and that those lights were just planes, to which i informed him that they were not planes, u.S. planes can't move that way.  he said he didn't believe in aliens and told his father what was going on because he could hear me screaming and crying over the phone.  my husband just sat there looking at the lights like they were a fireworks show or something, and i'm sure he had misgivings about what he was seeing.  he later told me that he did think the lights odd, but he was raised to be strong and not show fear to strange types of occurrences. (this incident did affect our relationship, but we have since fixed our problems). anyways, i ran to my car and locked myself in since i was too afraid to go into the house by myself and i wanted to be close by to make sure my husband was okay and continue watching the lights.  i watched the lights for several minutes from my car, and watched as they slowed down and eventually just sat in the sky hovering, before they slowly blinked off one by one until they were gone.  the whole experience lasted about 15 minutes start to finish.  i have since seen these exact same lights do the exact same thing twice since then.  once outside of my new house where i live now, and the last outside a field on a country road i was driving on.  both took place at night as well as while i was alone.  my only regret is being too frightened to take pictures of these incidents since i was terrified out of my mind.  i wish i had proof! nobody in my family believes what i saw, or they think it was secret government planes practicing maneuvers.  i've been laughed at for my new interest in ufos, so i had to share my experience with you to get this weight off my shoulders. thank you so much for your time, it's greatly appreciated!

yours sincerely, a new believer
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I saw several orbs preforming miraculous feats in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight at 9:16pm, while driving home, we observed 3 lights aligned in a triangle in the sky near garner nc. the lights were still and hovering just above the pine trees, no noise. they started to pulse bright red lights but then dimmed to a pinkish color. it traveled a short distance hovering and moving in a irregular pattern. it seem to move down behind the pines and then it vanished in the air. we tried to drive around the backside of the pine trees to a field where we know we would be able to see the sky clearly in many directions, but it was gone. if this were a plane or helicopter, we would have still been able to see it from any direction, north, south, east, west and up into the sky. we both agreed that we had witnessed a ufo. wished we had a camera.
content.summary: Unknow craft just above the trees; lights flashing

content.detailedDescription:
Was leaving home east of hillsdale @ 10:30pm, my pickup truck was outside of the garage and i was taking my dog with me for the ride to the party store. our neighbor is in the hospital in ann arbor, so i glanced at their house to make sure everything was ok, just as i was opening the back of the extended cab to let the dog jump in. i noticed the ufo over their house decending on an appareant steep decending glide.

i observed it for approx 10 seconds, and became very alarmed at what was obviously not a normal event. actually i became quite scared and ran in the house with the dog yelling for everyone to come on our back deck which i thought would give us a pass over or receeding view. 

from the time i last observed it until the time i was on the back porch with wife, daughter and son in law was no more than 25 seconds. none of us could see anything, although there were other planes lit up in the horizon.

i drew a image of what i saw. while observing i had the strong feeling that it was not normal and since our neighbor is in the hospital in ann arbor in grave condition on life support, my very first thought was that she had passed and this was her spirit over her home.

i was very excited and this made an impact on me that is hard to describe, i almost think i observed something supernatural, at least highly unusual
content.summary: Entering vehicle with dog for run to party store, observed and ran to get other witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: I had just pulled up in front of my house and was getting out of my car with my girlfriend. i always look up at the night sky and just happend to notice somthing that looked like a star going out. i thought it was a star going out. it looked like a white star that was randomly flashing, and every time it would flash it was in a different location. it seemed to move in a tringular pattern. i felt rather excited to see it at first when i saw it. then when i realized i we did not know what it was i started to feel unsure of my surroundings. when i finnaly lost sight of the object it had stoped flashing all together.
content.summary: Bright light flashing randomly and changing direction (triangle like flight path)

content.detailedDescription: We were on our couch when the wife noticed bright yellow/orange lights. unsure what the items were. very strange seeing this many objects at one time and not being able to identify them.  i felt i needed to take pictures to get a better look.  left camera in auto mode and had trouble focusing.  i went to get dressed and change lens to get a better shot.  the spheres quickly disappeared like shutting a light off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 orange/yellow spheres,  visible for a few minutes and then disapear

content.detailedDescription: Went outside around 11 p.M. to see if i could tell where the noise was coming from. when i got outside i realized the neighbor was shooting off left over fireworks. lame stuff, nothing big. i sat in my lounge chair ouside, nice night out and looked up. i thought it was weird to see 3 airplanes flying west all at the same time at night. i knew they were planes cause of the light pattern and i could kind of hear them. i was puzzled though that 3 planes would be going the same direction a second apart from eachother. i figured they were chemtrail planes and spraying at night to hide their agenda. just when i could no longer see the planes i happen to catch this weird orb like orange glowing object in the sky goin north to south. didn't seem high up, but it was dark out and couldn't judge it. of course my first thought is what is the government up to now. then right before that one got out of my sight another orb same exact size, color, shape, speed comes from the east and goes west. once they were out of my sight i came in turned on my computer...And started looking for info. seems there are a ton of people reporting the same thing. very interesting.
content.summary: 2 orange glowing orbs in different directions over my house

content.detailedDescription: Went outside around 11 p.M. to see if i could tell where the noise was coming from. when i got outside i realized the neighbor was shooting off left over fireworks. lame stuff, nothing big. i sat in my lounge chair ouside, nice night out and looked up. i thought it was weird to see 3 airplanes flying west all at the same time at night. i knew they were planes cause of the light pattern and i could kind of hear them. i was puzzled though that 3 planes would be going the same direction a second apart from eachother. i figured they were chemtrail planes and spraying at night to hide their agenda. just when i could no longer see the planes i happen to catch this weird orb like orange glowing object in the sky goin north to south. didn't seem high up, but it was dark out and couldn't judge it. of course my first thought is what is the government up to now. then right before that one got out of my sight another orb same exact size, color, shape, speed comes from the east and goes west. once they were out of my sight i came in turned on my computer...And started looking for info. seems there are a ton of people reporting the same thing. very interesting.
content.summary: 2 orange glowing orbs in different directions over my house

content.detailedDescription:
First, i never remember seeing a ufo. i didn't even know i was being abducted until 2 days ago. i read some reviews of the book "taken" and some red flags went up for me.

i will start with how an abduction usually begins:
usually night but it has happened during the day. i am in bed and i feel a presence in the room (i'm a psychic nothing amazing) then i feel like a heavy wait is on me, i cant move my body but can move my eyes and control my breathing. then i fall asleep or at times it seems  like nothing happened , the feeling just goes away. i only remember bits and pieces like a dream things like being in water i can breath. 
one afternoon, i remember lying facedown and hearing someone say "the disease resides at the base of the spine" but i now think it said device, the device resides at the base of the spine. i felt little tingled at the small of my back, no pain.
on another night years later, a presence came into my room and said " you have no idea what's in store for you tonight" then it left. during the night i awoke to the worst pain on the left side of my face. i went to the emergency room, was admitted by a nurse but i left before being seen by a doctor.    
 
the worst part about this is i know when this is going to happen before they come. but when i get in bed i suddenly don't care! it's like it ok to be taken from my bed for whatever reason. even as i type this its like there is nothing to worry about. it really makes no sense to me i know i do not want this to happen to me. i feel like a prisoner  in the back of my mind i know there is nothing i can do, and i must go. 

so this has gone on at least since i was in the 6th grade, i'm 30 now. being a psychic i thought it was a sprit or demon messing with me. this was nothing new, and i always felt i could handle whatever came my way... as a very small child i would follow "clear people" around the house. but i never told my family about it.

i could also give a description of one face i saw but it is not like anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: This has been ongoing for most of my life

content.detailedDescription: We went outside to look at the lightning, and as we were searching the sky we saw three orange glowing objects moving somewhat fast in a upward emotion across the sky for thirty seconds or so and then disappeared.
content.summary: Three orange circular shaped objects moved somewhat fast across the sky in a  upward motion and then quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the dupage county fair ground grandstand on july 4th 2012 at about 930-1030 watching surrounding town fireworks (our town was canceled due to a bad storm and no power).  we noticed these bright orange lights moving at a good rate of speed west to east and there was no noise.  wewatched them for about 15 min and they they just disappered i have a picture of 3 of them and my daughter has a video.  there were no planes or any aircraft in the area.  the 2 that were close were almost right next to each other.
content.summary: 2 bright lights apart followed by 2 bright orange lights close toghter followed by 3 more in the northen sky

content.detailedDescription: At 9:01 pm, i was seated on my sofa, facing west, viewing tv set as well as my macbook screen, when two bright, wide, very white lights very circular appeared in my picture window.  these two circular and stable lights were part of some flying vehicle that was headed away from me.  there was no sound.  my sliding glass doors are both open east and west. as i rose from the sofa and headed to the window, the two circular and steady bright white lights became only one light, as though the one to my right had gone off. soon after, the direction of the flight began to change by turning left in a curve, very smooth.  then i noticed a typical aircraft blinking red light.  as i have a set of condos directly across the street from my own, and the craft descended a bit, i could no longer see what it was doing.  this craft seemed to have no engine, and no heat from the lights.  lights i see normally affect the atmosphere and the eye recording them differently than these lights did.  i have never seen lights like these.  i know that there was no normal sort of propulsion happening with this craft as one observes with jets, airplanes, rockets, etc.  i tried to make out details on the material, but, could see only the lights.  there was a material body, however, as the clouds in the distance which had darkened against the dusk were blocked out between the lights.
content.summary: Two bright lights at rear of object became visible flying over my condo through my picture window

content.detailedDescription: Tonight around 9:05 i was on carowinds blvd in fort mill, sc sitting at a red light heading towards rt 77 in front of carowinds amusement park.   off in the distance i saw two sets of 6-7 yellow orbs of light off in the distance.  my best guess is that they were somewhere over the pineville area.  i originally noticed it because on of the formations looked like the big dipper and i briefly thought that's what it was.  the other formation was in the form of a circle.  i initially thought they might be normal air traffic for the airport but the circle in particular puzzled me.  as i continued to watch they start to slowly break formation rising to different altitudes at different rates of speed.  some disappeared, others kept rising.  the only logical explanation i can think of is some sort of light being lifted by a helium ballon that seems doubtful.  i'm really posting just to see if anyone else saw this.  i continued to drive and lost sight when i turned to get on the highway.
content.summary: Orbs of light seen from carowinds blvd (charlotte - fort mill area)

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway lighting fireworks when one orb came out randomly from the eastern sky. the orb was flashing orange colors and was flying at a high rate of speed (probably faster than an airplane). it shifted direction to the southeast, until another orb appeared in the same spot as the first orb came out. the second orb was the same size as the first one. if hover the same path as the first. it almost looked the the second orb was following the first orb. when i first saw the first orb, it looked almost like a meteor was entering the atmosphere. when i saw change direction to the southeast, i knew for sure it was a ufo. the two orbs that were following each other disappeared to the southeastern sky.
content.summary: Two orange orbs flying on the same path

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my wife were in lasvagus nev.For our daughters weading,we were leaving our hotel new york to see the sites and as we crossed over a pedestrian bridge i stopped in the center of the bridge to take a picture of the main street with my cellphone, i swear when i went to take the picture i saw nothing in the sky,i took the picture and we then moved on,later that night i reviewed my photos,thats when i realized i had something more than just a photo of downtown lasvagus,this photo is still in my cellphone it appears to be a very large object a v shape, it had one light on the bottom front on light farther back on its left wing (my left) on its right wing two lights (my right) i believe what it is it must have been going past at a speed that no one could observe it with the human eye,i believe my cellphone froze it in motion, i just dont know,maby somebody can explain it i sure cant,im a retired philly cop and i have seen a lot of weird things but this takes the cake, i cant say that i saw it with my own eyes but its there in my phone camera.
content.summary: After my daughter got married my wife and i left hotel new york while crossing on ped bridge took picture with cellphone of city

content.detailedDescription: I was on the balcony of an apt. in the city of birmingham,al, when i happened to glance over my shoulder and saw what appeared to be a bright orange odd  shape hovering over in the sky, it was moving in a path but barely. it was shortly before awaiting fireworks to go off, close to 9:30ish. i looked again confirming that what i was seeing was in fact real and not just meharding things, i kept a close eye on it on and off. then one of the times  i looked away and when i looked back it completely was gone as if it vanished into thin air. i have no idea what it was, but have definitely seen nothing ike it. if anyone has witnessed the same, please post. i'd love to find out.
content.summary: Bright orange odd shape glow light hovering in sky, al

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my car leaving my boyfriends house (he was with me but only saw the tail end of the event). th reason why i noticed it was because the blinking lights were very bright and they were very random. i first saw the lights near the center of the sky  blinking in a very random fashion but they were still all in a group. then it shot across the sky very fast an started blinking randomly again then just took off into the distance within a split second. there was no sound or anything.  i was practically mesmerized for a bit before i told my boyfriend to look at it. i could really formulate any sentences cause the lights were so bright i didn't wanna look away.
content.summary: Random blinking lights changing direction super fast then taking off

content.detailedDescription: While out fishing this ball came down and stoped above the water about 8 or 10 feet and 50 yards down stream bobed and came up in frunt of me for a couple minutes and bobed and went up stream about 50 yards stoped and after a short time bobed and went up real fast and gone. a long time later i found out that a large familly that lived down stream saw the hole thing and always wanderd who the man fishing was . of course this is a short version of the story .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Out fishing it came down stoped three times second stop in front of me therd stop then up and gone

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping with my two baby cousins in the same room and i just woke up around 3:00 am. i looked at the conor of the room by the bedroom window and saw a solid thing that was sicking out of the wall. at the moment i thought it was a decoration that was put up and i didn't see it before. but just before my eyes the object looked like it was disappearing away into the wall. i prayed to god since i was so scared but my cousins were still asleep. there was light coming form the bathroom next door so i knew what i saw was clear since the room wasn't compleatly dark. trying go back to sleep i felt an uneasy feeling and i started to see lights out side of the window bhinde the blinds. so i got up and called my mother to explain what was happening. but that feeling just got stronger and i was begeging to feel like i was being controled so i ran out of the room.
content.summary: This black soild object was hovering half way in and half way out of the bedroom from the wall.
